news.title: Union sues Trump administration for shutting down student loan repayment plans
news.summary: The American Federation of Teachers is suing the U.S. Department of Education for shutting down access to affordable repayment plans for student loan borrowers.

news.title: Zelenskyy says he will talk to Trump as Russia, Ukraine report overnight strikes
news.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said he would hold talks with White House leader Donald Trump. Moscow and Kyiv reported overnight attacks hours.

news.title: Meta's potential exit from Delaware had governor worried enough to call special weekend meetings
news.summary: Delaware lawmakers debate a bill that could dramatically alter the state's corporate law. Facebook founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg has a lot at stake in the outcome.

news.title: Weekly mortgage demand pulls back, as interest rates rise for the first time in 9 weeks
news.summary: Mortgage rates fell for the first time in nine weeks, causing a pullback in mortgage demand, especially refinancing. Mortgage rates fell in the first week of November.

news.title: Tencent profit surges 90% as it touts AI revenue boost and ramps up spending
news.summary: Tencent posted a fourth-quarter beat on top and bottom line driven by a surge in gaming and advertising revenue. Tencent on Wednesday posted aFourth-quarter Beat on Top and Bottom Line driven by Surge in Gaming and Advertising Revenue.

news.title: European defense stocks dip from peaks after traders ‘buy the rumor, sell the fact’
news.summary: There's now looming uncertainty about how exactly new military spending will be allocated. There’s now looming Uncertainty about How Exactly New Military Spending will Be allocated.

news.title: There are new fears about Fed firings after FTC dismissals. What analysts are saying.
news.summary: The action taken late on Tuesday is again raising the question of Trump’s authority to dismiss Fed officials. The action was taken late Tuesday, raising the questions of whether the president has the authority to do so.

news.title: Netflix paid $55 million for a show. Prosecutors say the creator blew it on Rolls Royces and crypto.
news.summary: Netflix paid Carl Erik Rinsch top dollar during the peak streaming boom for a sci-fi series he never delivered, prosecutors say. He lost it all on bad investments and luxury goods, prosecutors said.

news.title: General Mills sees slump in snack sales as customers focus on essentials
news.summary: ’s organic net sales “finished below our expectations,” the company said in a statement. The company said that organic net Sales ‘finished below’ its expectations.

news.title: Oil prices tick lower after Russia agrees to 30-day halt on energy-infrastructure attacks
news.summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin rejected a full cease-fire in the country’s invasion of Ukraine. Putin agreed to a mutual halt on energy infrastructure for 30 days.
